bosom.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the front part of a woman’s chest
bosom.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: She cradled the child to her bosom.
bosom.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a word meaning someone’s feelings and emotions, used especially when these are bad or unpleasant
bosom.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: Drury harboured bitterness in his bosom.
